issue.title: [Java][Doc] Review existing documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15574](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15574). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Review existing documentation ( https://arrow.apache.org/docs/java/ ) to make sure it’s easy to follow and complete (does it cover how to work with all possible types?)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15574?focusedCommentId=17508936) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
We are using [this google sheets\|[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1sIL51v-E8l_4v8U3DkEFhdhGivXiUbv-wYDSOPJ33uw/edit?usp=sharing]] to tracking changes

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15574?focusedCommentId=17513656) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
This is the final proposal for arrow java documentation:
